name: Koules
description:
Somewhere in the galaxy. Once upon a time the evil KOULES exhausted all the resources of their home planet.
Their emperor DARK APPLEPOLISHER deployed his brutal hyperspace commandos to wipe out human civilization and claim Earth's
resources for his realms. The nations of Earth chose their best warriors to defend the planet.
These champions were biologically mutated into special creatures. Their entities were reduced to mere chests and eyes.
These qualities allow them operate in enemies' domain Your battle for a new world begins.

Your mission is to bounce all KOULES fighters from your sector.
Some of them are deserters.
The green ones give you acceleration, the blue ones give you more weight.
Look out for mighty super-spherical megaheavy ultra green B_BALL.
